required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Imaging-based Deep Learning for Lung Cancer Diagnosis and Staging
clinical_study.official_title: The Role of CNN Architecture-based Transfer Learning of Medical Imaging in Lung Cancer Diagnosis and Staging

brief_summary.textblock: Lung cancer diagnosis and staging are two fundamental and critical issue in clinical lung cancer management and therapeutic decision-making. Invasive procedures for pathologic analysis are gold standard for diagnosis and staging, however, invasive procedures related-complications are inevitable. Noninvasive medical imaging is a powerful tool, however there is almost no room for improvement just according to the experience of radiologist and clinician. The researchers will investigate the role of computer based deep learning of medical imaging in the diagnosis of lesion of lung, lymph node and other sites suspected with metastasis.

primary_outcome.measure: pathologic result revealed cancer cell involvement in lesion

arm_group.arm_group_label: cancer cell involvement predicted by deep learning
arm_group.description: the participants with lesions of lung, lymph node or other sites predicted as positive for cancer cell involvement by imaging based deep learning.

arm_group.arm_group_label: no cancer cell involvement predicted by deep learning
arm_group.description: the participants with lesions of lung, lymph node or other sites predicted as negative for cancer cell involvement by imaging based deep learning.

intervention.arm_group_label: cancer cell involvement predicted by deep learning
no cancer cell involvement predicted by deep learning
cancer cell involvement predicted by deep learning
no cancer cell involvement predicted by deep learning

study_pop.textblock: Lung cancer patients with PET/CT or CT examination before any cancer-specific treatment

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Pathological diagnosis of lung cancer
- PET/CT or CT examination before any cancer-specific treatment
Exclusion Criteria:
- A history of other malignancies
